City Council
============

Agendas & Minutes
-----------------

The City Council meets on 4th Tuesday of every month unless conflicts occur.  Agendas are available prior to the meetings. Minutes are available following approval.

[View Most Recent Agendas and Minutes](https://littlefieldtexas.net/AgendaCenter/City-Council-2)
